name: Keyboard Twister (Zhamul)
description:
Game created on the back seat of tandem bike in JamBike going from Stockholm to Malmö.

How to Play:
Hold yellow keys.

Green keys are successful.

Red keys are failed.

Exclamation marks are wrong keys.
